entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] WBT failing to install with `Could not find IncludedWorkloadManifests.txt` because the file was renamed #86192
    8.0.0
  • Move ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.Tests.Generator to be an IIncrementalGenerator-based source generator #86190
  • [Breaking Change] Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to only unwrap wrappers from the target ComWrappers instance #86189
    8.0.0
  • ilcompiler: System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsSupported has already been added #86186
  • JIT: Fix test setting general JitStress #86185
    8.0.0
  • May 9 21:11:41 server883 kernel: [218937.760135] .NET Server GC[1427719]: segfault at 8 ip 00007f7440ae835c sp 00007f74395bfdf0 error 6 #86183
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.Abstractions' with .net 7.0.5 #86182
  • ICorProfilerCallback.AssemblyUnloadStarted is never called #86178
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Allow containment to reorder the same single exceptions #86173
    Future
  • [mono][hotreload] Add a property in a type #86172
    8.0.0
  • CI failure in the "banana" rid leg on Centos Stream 8 #86169
  • Minor cleanup of approved Avx512 API surface #86168
    8.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] chrome failing to start #86166
  • [wasm] blazor perf builds failing #86165
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Text.Json.Tests` AOT failing with v8, and chrome #86164
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Provide "single-file" deployment #86162
    Future
  • [CoreCLR] Implement support for `UnsafeAccesorAttribute` #86161
    8.0.0
  • GenerateReferenceSource workflow when adding new classes to System.Private.CoreLib #86160
    8.0.0
  • Maui - .Net iOS App Store rejection: App references non-public symbols #86156
  • Docker Container Build : (Cleanup Temporary Target Assembly target) -> C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Microsoft.WinFx.targets(480,10): error MSB3061: Unable to delete file obj\x86\Release\. Access to the path is denied #86153
  • [mono][interpreter] System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() does not show any callstack when running with interpreter enabled #86148
  • Memory leak after configuration disposal from PhysicalFileProvider #86146
  • Consider renaming COM* types in clr native code to CLR* #86145
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: An HTTP/2 connection could not be established because the server did not complete the HTTP/2 handshake #86142
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86141
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #86134
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NRE in Networking Telemetry EventSources #77434
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #85992
    8.0.0
  • The build instructions do not mention clr.dactools (soon nativeprereqs) #58328
    Future
  • Official build fails due to missing windows_arm job #86073
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: Ensure native linux hosted asmdiffs work #86181
    Future
  • Native AOT Trimming & Perf Improvements in .NET 8 #79003
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: Spurious diffs when stressing profiler ELT callbacks #82164
    Future
  • SPMI: Native Linux-hosted throughput runs #85749
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 5/1/2023 6:56:14 PM #85986
    8.0.0
  • CentOS 8-based source-build legs failing in CI #86124
  • Remove libraries folders that don't have src/*.cs files #78978
    Future
  • Wasm perf runs are completely broken due to recent changes #86001
  • Question about instruction groups #86117
  • Remove old multi-dimensional array code #71678
    8.0.0
  • Consider passing `enregisterLocalVars` as a template argument to LinearScan #82848
    8.0.0
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86140
  • Performance regression observed for RSA.ImportParameters in Ubuntu when upgrading from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 #84760
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64147
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] InstallWorkloadFromArtifacts: remove unnecessary workaround #86191
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Specify NUnit test runner for illink tests #86187
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • GetChromeVersions task: Try to find older versions, if the latest one is #86184
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix EventPipe shutdown logic #86180
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete the verification type system #86179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use /INCREMENTAL:NO for Debug #86170
    needs-area-label
  • avoid ProtocolToken allocations in TLS handshake #86163
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • JIT: do early block merging in more cases #86157
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix lint issues #86155
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Run fgValueNumberConstLoad for invariant loads #86154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] introduce sourcemaps #86152
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Always expand cctor helpers for NAOT #86147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add fp <--> int conversions to PackedSimd #86143
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable PackedSimd in the interpreter; interpreter/jiterpreter v128 bug fixes #86136
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Avoid NRE in networking EventSources #86171
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Make the STJ source generator cache friendly #86121
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix the test build error #86176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update debugging-runtime.md to mention nativeprereqs #86174
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix spurious SuperPMI asm diffs #86132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Write generic method, write complex signatures like array/pointer/generics #86026
    area-System.Reflection
  • Convert JIT/Performance to a merged test group #85851
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for RUC warnings on override methods #86015
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • [browser] improve CSP #86158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT/SIMD to a merged test group #85852
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/opt to a merged test group #85850
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Generics to a merged test group #85849
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unify boot config location #85763
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix official build of cross DAC components #86138
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove unused multi-dimensional array code #86133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix createdump --crashreport option error #86137
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Reorder urllib and remove --force-reinstall but keep pinned version #86128
    area-Infrastructure
  • Tweak new OutOfMemory_StringTooLong exception message #86150
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Expose remaining Avx512 integer intrinsics which don't require VectorMask #86130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-approved, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix emitOutputInstr #86078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete more code around reflection blocking #86139
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update portable linux source-build legs to use AlmaLinux to better represent building on RHEL8 #86114
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an SSA bug from the `ASG` refactoring #86108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Show method names in JitDisasm #86060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Added float32 support and implemented all R4 opcodes #86092
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade gcc CI to use gcc13 #86051
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new globaljson should have allowPrerelease option #32500
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • Test project on Mac complain about not having windows target (NETSDK1136) #32480

Closed

  • Ubuntu_22_04 Build_Release CI build fails to copy asset file intermittently #27658
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • #24909 Add condition for System.NET.http to work for Multitargeting .NETFramework #32504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Cli integration tests which are migrated to dotnet/templating #32477
    untriaged
  • Default all containers to linux instead of the current SDK's OS #32473
    Area-Containers
  • Support side by side workload manifests in SDK resolver #32471
    untriaged

Merged

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • [release/7.0.4xx] fixed `_ContainerIsTargetingNet8TFM` evaluation #32484
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #32447
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Championed: Target-typed implicit array creation expression `new[]` #2701
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix link to implemention status in Readme #7188
  • Fix typos #7192
  • Collection literals working group notes 2023-05-10 #7190

Updated

  • Collection literals: add type inference #7171

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ctor' snippet generate wrong name in nested class #68176

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33712.304 #68184
  • Method Returns string[] But var types as string[]? #53078
  • ToDisplayString for IParameterSymbol adds parameter name nomatter the settings (by default) #67464
    17.7
  • [8.0.100-preview.3.23178.7] Incremental Roslyn Source Generator ToDisplayString() method returns different value in 7.0.20X and later #67632
    17.7
  • [API proposal] Option for displaying standalone parameter names #67478
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests #68183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update interceptors branch from latest main #68182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only do LOC for 17.6 #68181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update compiler tool set version in 17.5 #68180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement compile-time boundary checks around inline arrays access. #68178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix 'ctor' snippet in nested class #68177
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle binding tuple type in explicit interface implementation tuple member #68174
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68114
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, untriaged, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use versioned python3 command in scripts #48221
  • Improve Razor Component Sections #48219
  • Blazor Server App suddenly throws error in blazor.server.js: Range Offset is outside the bounds of the DataView #48216
  • Asp.Net core takes 12 minutes for initial page load #48215
  • JavaScript interop calls cannot be issued at this time. This is because the circuit has disconnected and is being disposed #48220
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #48208
  • Exception in the console of an empty Blazor WebAssembly app(dotnet.6.0.16) #48206
  • ASP.NET Core ❤️ Debugging #48205
  • Blazor CSP - Directive unsafe-inline for styles #48204

Closed

  • `IHttpContextScopedAccessor` for accessing `HttpContext` from request scoped DI components #47996
  • Fully occupied /tmp for ASP Dot Net Core hosted on AWS Lambda is breaking API's #48149
  • Make Http Logging Middleware Endpoint aware #43222
    8.0-preview4
  • Passing IServiceProvider to AddTransientHttpErrorPolicy like AddPolicyHandler #48200
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.Abstractions' with .net 7.0.5 #48209
  • Aspnet core webhook #48153
  • Make Blazor Wasm SubDomain Routing Internal #48197
  • Unified app model routing #47668
    8.0-preview5
  • Remove `unsafe-eval` CSP Requirement for Blazor WASM #37787
    8.0-preview5
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #46533
    8.0-preview5
  • Consider breaking API change for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.RenderMode #47133
    8.0-preview5
  • Links are broken for published Blazor WebAssembly project on GitHub pages #48183
  • gRPC transcoding supports custom HttpRule #48192

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    needs-area-label
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update HttpLoggingAttribute API #48214
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix build requirements (VS, yarn) #48213
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Revert Microsoft.CodeAnalysis package changes in prebuilt baseline #48212
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove use of legacy interop preventing CSP compliance in Blazor WebAssembly #48182
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Missing dot. #48202
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9af2053` to `2bc2374` #48210
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a358018` to `bb2941f` #48211
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add support for custom HttpRule types to gRPC JSON transcoding #48194
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview5
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to debug iOS MAUI app #15065
  • Bluetooth permission getting fails on Kindle Fire, works on Galaxy ZFlip #15063
  • ContentProperty leads to XamlC error XFC0009 while compiling #15061
  • Rounded corners on MAUI Shell Flyout menu on Windows. #15060
  • Mac Catalyst loses Shell Content items under Tabs only when maximized #15057
  • Background color not changing when setting visual state and command on button #15055
    Backlog
  • Something is collecting the styles #15054
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ListView with HasUnevenRows="true" doesn't resize dynamically #15053
    Backlog
  • System.Drawing.Primitives, Version=7.0.0.0 error on Android 11 device #15050
  • Animations doesn't work on Android 11 device #15049
  • Maui Mac App Rejected on App Store Review as crashes on launch. #15047
  • Views always returning -1 as Width #15046

Closed

  • App Lifecycle event OnResume called more than once. #7894
    Backlog
  • Entitlements.plist is not used correctly in Debug configuration #14662
  • MAUI - binding native iOS Swift library #14982
  • ImageButton does not render Image source for Current Theme Colors #7481
  • [Windows] Flyout changes page's content width. #15033

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Trying just this #15056
  • Fix NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #15052
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Updated

  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
  • Update DEVELOPMENT and README to make it clear that you need to run the build tasks. #15030
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use ReplaceMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Combine AutoInclude with Filtered Include #30883
  • GroupBy over column converted by Convert.ToString creates only one group #30882
  • Add suppressTransactions optional flag to DbContext.Database.Migrate methods #30881
  • "7.0.5 is not compatible with net70" #30880
  • Azure Pipeline, dotnet ef migrations bundle, fails when 'assemblyVersion' defined #30879
  • Registering AddPooledDbContextFactory side by side with AddDbContext #30878
  • Constraint Generation Issue With TPH and multiple relationships #30877

Closed

  • untheorized access exception on running dotnet ef migration bundle command #30876

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Help building .NET6 on Oracle Linux 9 #16390

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve NuGet.config issues in the VMR #16386

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16374
  • Find the releases dll in the correct path #16380

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2179414 #16348
  • vmr-build: add job that builds a Mono runtime. #16357
